org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc

Interface RiverContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnRiverContext, SimpleRiverContext

    public interface RiverContext
    The River Context is a collection of objects that are relevant to parameterization of a river run. Beside holding references to river definition, source and mouth, the objects control the behavior of the river source.
